select SourceSchemaName
, SourceTableName
,SourceQuery + case
when LastwatermarkValue IS NULL 
	AND WaterMarkDateType ='datetime'
	then '01/01/1900'
when LastwatermarkValue IS NULL 
	AND WaterMarkDateType ='int'
	then '0'
when LastwatermarkValue IS NULL 
	AND WaterMarkDateType ='N/A'
	then ''
	Else ''''+LastwatermarkValue+''''
	end as SourceQuery,
	SourceName
FROM incrementalLoadMetadata
WHERE SourceName = ''
AND isActive =1;

SELECT
(SELECT MAX(RegisteredPropertyId) FROM dbo.tbRegisteredProperty ) AS MaxtbRegisteredProperty,
(SELECT MAX(ServiceRequestID) FROM dbo.tbSearchResult ) AS MaxtbSearchResult,
(SELECT MAX(StatusDate) FROM dbo.tbServiceRequest ) AS MaxtbServiceRequest,
(SELECT MAX(propertyID) FROM dbo.tbProperty ) AS MaxtbProperty,
(SELECT MAX(StatusDate) FROM dbo.tbSearch ) AS MaxtbSearch,
(SELECT MAX(InstrumentID) FROM dbo.tbInstrument ) AS MaxtbInstrument,
(SELECT MAX(partyid) FROM dbo.tbParty ) AS MaxtbParty,
(SELECT MAX(RegisteredOwnerID) FROM dbo.tbRegisteredOwner ) AS MaxtbRegisteredOwner;
